entry.title: WIND WARNING , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:56 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 10:38 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: W 35 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2.
